info.name: searx to google [beta] 2019
info.description: this style will let searx look like google
info.additionalInfo:
v.0.2
- styles only look good at search result page and is optimized only for widths greater than 1200px
- the markup of searx is such a pain in the a** that it is hard to apply these styles only to the result page. you will see weird behaviour on the start page.


v.0.1
-fixed the weird breaks around 1200px
-container has now fixed margins, to fit more the design of google

Info: layout will break of width below 992px

[alpha]
-please note this style is not finished yet, it will break the layout to all widths below 1200px
